contents.zh-CHS: 4.4.2 `PHB-->CLP映射'

contents.text: If the L-LSP is egressing on an ATM interface (i.e., it is an ATM-LSR or it is a frame-based LSR sending packets on an LC-ATM interface or on an ATM interface which is not label switching controlled), then one `PHB-->CLP mapping' is added to the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' for this outgoing L-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果L-LSP在ATM接口上退出（即，它是一个ATM-LSR或它是一个基于帧的LSR，在LC-ATM接口上或在一个不受标签交换控制的ATM接口上发送数据包），则一个“PHB-->CLP映射”被添加到该出站L-LSP的“PHB-->封装映射集”。

contents.text: If the L-LSP is egressing over an ATM interface which is not label-controlled, the `PHB-->CLP mapping' is populated as per section 3.4.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果L-LSP通过不受标签控制的ATM接口出口，则按照第3.4.2节填充“PHB-->CLP映射”。

contents.text: If the L-LSP is egressing over an LC-ATM interface, the `PHB-->CLP mapping' is populated in the following way:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果L-LSP通过LC-ATM接口退出，“PHB-->CLP映射”按以下方式填充：

contents.text: - it is a function of the PSC supported on this LSP, and should use the relevant mapping entries for this PSC from the Default `PHB-->CLP mapping' defined in section 3.4.2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: - 它是此LSP支持的PSC的一个功能，应使用第3.4.2.1节中定义的默认“PHB-->CLP映射”中此PSC的相关映射项。

contents.text: Notice that if the LSR is a frame-based LSR supporting an L-LSP egressing over an ATM interface, then the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' contains both a `PHB-->EXP mapping' and a `PHB-->CLP mapping'. If the LSR is an ATM-LSR supporting an L-LSP, then the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' only contains a `PHB-->CLP mapping'.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，如果LSR是基于帧的LSR，支持通过ATM接口出口的L-LSP，则“PHB-->封装映射集”包含“PHB-->EXP映射”和“PHB-->CLP映射”。如果LSR是支持L-LSP的ATM-LSR，则“PHB-->封装映射集”仅包含“PHB-->CLP映射”。

contents.text: 4.4.3 `PHB-->DE mapping'

If the L-LSP is egressing over a Frame Relay interface (i.e., it is an LSR sending packets on an LC-FR interface or on a Frame Relay interface which is not label switching controlled), one `PHB-->DE mapping' is added to the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' for this outgoing L-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果L-LSP通过帧中继接口（即，它是在LC-FR接口上或在不受标签交换控制的帧中继接口上发送数据包的LSR）退出，则会将一个“PHB-->解映射”添加到此出站L-LSP的“PHB-->封装映射集”。

contents.text: If the L-LSP is egressing over a FR interface which is not label switching controlled, the `PHB-->DE mapping' is populated as per section 3.4.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果L-LSP通过不受标签切换控制的FR接口退出，则按照第3.4.3节填充“PHB-->解映射”。

contents.text: If the L-LSP is egressing over an LC-FR interface, the `PHB-->DE mapping' is populated in the following way:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果L-LSP通过LC-FR接口退出，“PHB-->解映射”按以下方式填充：

contents.text: - it is a function of the PSC supported on this LSP, and should use the relevant mapping entries for this PSC from the Default `PHB-->DE mapping' defined in section 3.4.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: - 它是此LSP上支持的PSC的一个功能，应使用第3.4.3.1节中定义的默认“PHB-->解映射”中此PSC的相关映射条目。

contents.text: Notice that if the LSR is an Edge-LSR supporting an L-LSP egressing over a LC-FR interface, then the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' contains both a `PHB-->EXP mapping' and a `PHB-->DE mapping'. If the LSR is a FR-LSR supporting an L-LSP, then the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' only contains a `PHB-->DE mapping'.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，如果LSR是支持通过LC-FR接口出口的L-LSP的边缘LSR，“PHB-->封装映射集”包含“PHB-->EXP映射”和“PHB-->反映射”。如果LSR是支持L-LSP的FR-LSR，则“PHB-->封装映射集”仅包含“PHB-->反映射”。

contents.text: 4.4.4 `PHB-->802.1 mapping'
If the LSP is egressing over a LAN interface on which multiple 802.1 Traffic Classes are supported, as defined in [IEEE_802.1], then one `PHB-->802.1 mapping' is added as per section 3.4.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 如[IEEE_802.1]中所定义，如果LSP通过支持多个802.1通信量类别的LAN接口退出，则根据第3.4.4节添加一个“PHB-->802.1映射”。

contents.text: 4.5 Encoding Diff-Serv Information into Encapsulation Layer on Outgoing L-LSP
contents.zh-CHS: 4.5 在输出L-LSP上将区分服务信息编码到封装层

contents.text: This section defines how to encode Diff-Serv information into the MPLS encapsulation Layer for a transmitted label entry corresponding to an outgoing L-LSP. This requires that the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' is populated as defined in section 4.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了如何将Diff Serv信息编码到MPLS封装层，以用于对应于传出L-LSP的已传输标签条目。这要求按照第4.4节中的定义填充“PHB-->封装映射集”。

contents.text: The LSR first determines the `Set of PHB-->Encaps mappings' of the Diff-Serv Context associated with the corresponding label in the NHLFE and then performs corresponding encoding as specified in sections 3.5.1, 3.5.2, 3.5.3 and 3.5.4.
contents.zh-CHS: LSR首先确定与NHLFE中相应标签相关联的区分服务上下文的“PHB-->封装映射集”，然后按照第3.5.1、3.5.2、3.5.3和3.5.4节的规定执行相应的编码。

contents.text: 4.6 L-LSP Merging
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6 L-LSP合并

contents.text: In an MPLS domain, two or more LSPs can be merged into one LSP at one LSR. L-LSPs are compatible with LSP Merging under the following condition:
contents.zh-CHS: 在MPLS域中，可以在一个LSR上将两个或多个LSP合并为一个LSP。在以下条件下，L-LSP与LSP合并兼容：

contents.text: L-LSPs can only be merged into one L-LSP if they support the same PSC.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果L-LSP支持相同的PSC，则它们只能合并为一个L-LSP。

contents.text: The above merge condition MUST be enforced by LSRs, through explicit checking at label setup, that the same PSC is supported on the merged LSPs.
contents.zh-CHS: LSR必须通过标签设置时的显式检查强制执行上述合并条件，以确保合并的LSP上支持相同的PSC。

contents.text: Note that when L-LSPs merge, the bandwidth that is available for the PSC downstream of the merge point must be sufficient to carry the sum of the merged traffic. This is particularly important in the case of EF traffic. This can be ensured in multiple ways (for instance via provisioning, or via bandwidth signaling and explicit admission control).
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，当L-LSP合并时，合并点下游PSC可用的带宽必须足以承载合并流量的总和。这在EF流量的情况下尤为重要。这可以通过多种方式确保（例如通过供应，或通过带宽信令和显式许可控制）。

contents.text: 5. RSVP Extension for Diff-Serv Support
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 用于区分服务支持的RSVP扩展

contents.text: The MPLS architecture does not assume a single label distribution protocol. [RSVP_MPLS_TE] defines the extension to RSVP for establishing LSPs in MPLS networks. This section specifies the extensions to RSVP, beyond those defined in [RSVP_MPLS_TE], to establish LSPs supporting Differentiated Services in MPLS networks.
contents.zh-CHS: MPLS体系结构不采用单标签分发协议。[RSVP_MPLS_TE]定义了RSVP的扩展，用于在MPLS网络中建立lsp。本节规定了RSVP的扩展，超出了[RSVP_MPLS_TE]中定义的扩展，以建立支持MPLS网络中差异化服务的LSP。

contents.text: 5.1 Diff-Serv related RSVP Messages Format
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1 区分服务相关RSVP消息格式

contents.text: One new RSVP Object is defined in this document: the DIFFSERV Object. Detailed description of this Object is provided below. This new Object is applicable to Path messages. This specification only defines the use of the DIFFSERV Object in Path messages used to establish LSP Tunnels in accordance with [RSVP_MPLS_TE] and thus containing a Session Object with a C-Type equal to LSP_TUNNEL_IPv4 and containing a LABEL_REQUEST object.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文定义了一个新的RSVP对象：DIFFSERV对象。下文提供了该对象的详细说明。此新对象适用于路径消息。本规范仅定义在用于根据[RSVP_MPLS_TE]建立LSP隧道的路径消息中使用DIFFSERV对象，从而包含一个C类型等于LSP_TUNNEL_IPv4并包含一个LABEL_请求对象的会话对象。

contents.text: Restrictions defined in [RSVP_MPLS_TE] for support of the establishment of LSP Tunnels via RSVP are also applicable to the establishment of LSP Tunnels supporting Diff-Serv: for instance, only unicast LSPs are supported and Multicast LSPs are for further study.
contents.zh-CHS: [RSVP_MPLS_TE]中定义的用于支持通过RSVP建立LSP隧道的限制也适用于支持区分服务的LSP隧道的建立：例如，仅支持单播LSP，多播LSP有待进一步研究。

contents.text: This new DIFFSERV object is optional with respect to RSVP so that general RSVP implementations not concerned with MPLS LSP set up do not have to support this object.
contents.zh-CHS: 这个新的DIFFSERV对象对于RSVP是可选的，因此与MPLS LSP设置无关的一般RSVP实现不必支持这个对象。

contents.text: The DIFFSERV Object is optional for support of LSP Tunnels as defined in [RSVP_MPLS_TE]. A Diff-Serv capable LSR supporting E-LSPs using the preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping' in compliance with this specification MAY support the DIFFSERV Object. A Diff-Serv capable LSR supporting E-LSPs using a signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping' in compliance with this specification MUST support the DIFFSERV Object. A Diff-Serv capable LSR supporting L-LSPs in compliance with this specification MUST support the DIFFSERV Object.
contents.zh-CHS: DIFFSERV对象是可选的，用于支持[RSVP_MPLS_TE]中定义的LSP隧道。支持E-LSP的具有区分服务功能的LSR（使用符合本规范的预配置“EXP<-->PHB映射”）可能支持区分服务对象。支持使用符合本规范的信号“EXP<-->PHB映射”的E-LSP的具有区分服务功能的LSR必须支持区分服务对象。支持符合本规范的L-LSP的具有区分服务功能的LSR必须支持区分服务对象。

contents.text: 5.1.1 Path Message Format
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1.1 路径消息格式

contents.text: The format of the Path message is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: Path消息的格式如下所示：

contents.text:
<Path Message> ::=       <Common Header> [ <INTEGRITY> ]
                         <SESSION> <RSVP_HOP>
                         <TIME_VALUES>
                         [ <EXPLICIT_ROUTE> ]
                         <LABEL_REQUEST>
                         [ <SESSION_ATTRIBUTE> ]
                         [ <DIFFSERV> ]
                         [ <POLICY_DATA> ... ]
                         [ <sender descriptor> ]

<sender descriptor> ::=  <SENDER_TEMPLATE> <SENDER_TSPEC>
                         [ <ADSPEC> ]
                         [ <RECORD_ROUTE> ]
5.2 DIFFSERV Object
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2 区分服务对象

contents.text: The DIFFSERV object formats are shown below. Currently there are two possible C_Types. Type 1 is a DIFFSERV object for an E-LSP. Type 2 is a DIFFSERV object for an L-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: DIFFSERV对象格式如下所示。目前有两种可能的C_类型。类型1是E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象。类型2是L-LSP的DIFFSERV对象。

contents.text: 5.2.1. DIFFSERV object for an E-LSP:
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.1. E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象：

contents.text: class = 65, C_Type = 1
contents.zh-CHS: 等级=65，C_类型=1

contents.text: Reserved : 28 bits This field is reserved. It must be set to zero on transmission and must be ignored on receipt.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：此字段保留28位。传输时必须将其设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: MAPnb : 4 bits Indicates the number of MAP entries included in the DIFFSERV Object. This can be set to any value from 0 to 8.
contents.zh-CHS: MAPnb:4位表示DIFFSERV对象中包含的映射项的数量。这可以设置为0到8之间的任何值。

contents.text: MAP : 32 bits Each MAP entry defines the mapping between one EXP field value and one PHB. The MAP entry has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: MAP:32位每个MAP条目定义一个EXP字段值和一个PHB之间的映射。地图条目具有以下格式：

contents.text: Reserved : 13 bits This field is reserved. It must be set to zero on transmission and must be ignored on receipt.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：13位此字段保留。传输时必须将其设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: EXP : 3 bits This field contains the value of the EXP field for the `EXP<-->PHB mapping' defined in this MAP entry.
contents.zh-CHS: EXP:3位此字段包含此映射项中定义的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的EXP字段的值。

contents.text: PHBID : 16 bits This field contains the PHBID of the PHB for the `EXP<-->PHB mapping' defined in this MAP entry. The PHBID is encoded as specified in [PHBID].
contents.zh-CHS: PHBID：16位此字段包含此映射项中定义的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的PHB的PHBID。PHBID按照[PHBID]中的规定进行编码。

contents.text: 5.2.2 DIFFSERV object for an L-LSP:
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2.2 L-LSP的DIFFSERV对象：

contents.text: class = 65, C_Type = 2
contents.zh-CHS: 等级=65，C_类型=2

contents.text: Reserved : 16 bits This field is reserved. It must be set to zero on transmission and must be ignored on receipt.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：16位此字段保留。传输时必须将其设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: PSC : 16 bits The PSC indicates a PHB Scheduling Class to be supported by the LSP. The PSC is encoded as specified in [PHBID].
contents.zh-CHS: PSC:16位PSC表示LSP支持的PHB调度类。PSC按照[PHBID]中的规定进行编码。

contents.text: 5.3 Handling DIFFSERV Object
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3 处理区分服务对象

contents.text: To establish an LSP tunnel with RSVP, the sender creates a Path message with a session type of LSP_Tunnel_IPv4 and with a LABEL_REQUEST object as per [RSVP_MPLS_TE].
contents.zh-CHS: 要使用RSVP建立LSP隧道，发送方根据[RSVP_MPLS_TE]创建会话类型为LSP_tunnel_IPv4且带有标签_请求对象的路径消息。

contents.text: To establish an E-LSP tunnel with RSVP, which uses the Preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping', the sender creates a Path message:
contents.zh-CHS: 要使用RSVP建立E-LSP隧道，该隧道使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”，发送方将创建一条路径消息：

contents.text: - with a session type of LSP_Tunnel_IPv4,
contents.zh-CHS: - 会话类型为LSP_Tunnel_IPv4，

contents.text: - with the LABEL_REQUEST object, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用LABEL_请求对象，以及

contents.text: - without the DIFFSERV object.
contents.zh-CHS: - 没有DIFFSERV对象。

contents.text: To establish an E-LSP tunnel with RSVP, which uses the Preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping', the sender MAY alternatively create a Path message:
contents.zh-CHS: 要使用RSVP建立E-LSP隧道，该隧道使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”，发送方也可以创建路径消息：

contents.text: - with a session type of LSP_Tunnel_IPv4,
contents.zh-CHS: - 会话类型为LSP_Tunnel_IPv4，

contents.text: - with the LABEL_REQUEST object, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用LABEL_请求对象，以及

contents.text: - with the DIFFSERV object for an E-LSP containing no MAP entries.
contents.zh-CHS: - 不包含映射项的E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象。

contents.text: To establish an E-LSP tunnel with RSVP, which uses a signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping', the sender creates a Path message:
contents.zh-CHS: 要使用RSVP建立E-LSP隧道，该隧道使用信号“EXP<-->PHB映射”，发送方创建路径消息：

contents.text: - with a session type of LSP_Tunnel_IPv4,
contents.zh-CHS: - 会话类型为LSP_Tunnel_IPv4，

contents.text: - with the LABEL_REQUEST object,
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用LABEL_REQUEST对象，

contents.text: - with the DIFFSERV object for an E-LSP containing one MAP entry for each EXP value to be supported on this E-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象，该对象包含此E-LSP上支持的每个EXP值的一个映射条目。

contents.text: To establish with RSVP an L-LSP tunnel, the sender creates a Path message:
contents.zh-CHS: 要使用RSVP建立L-LSP隧道，发送方将创建路径消息：

contents.text: - with a session type of LSP_Tunnel_IPv4,
contents.zh-CHS: - 会话类型为LSP_Tunnel_IPv4，

contents.text: - with the LABEL_REQUEST object,
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用LABEL_REQUEST对象，

contents.text: - with the DIFFSERV object for an L-LSP containing the PHB Scheduling Class (PSC) supported on this L-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用包含此L-LSP支持的PHB调度类（PSC）的L-LSP的DIFFSERV对象。

contents.text: If a path message contains multiple DIFFSERV objects, only the first one is meaningful; subsequent DIFFSERV object(s) must be ignored and not forwarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果路径消息包含多个DIFFSERV对象，则只有第一个对象有意义；后续的DIFFSERV对象必须被忽略且不能转发。

contents.text: Each LSR along the path records the DIFFSERV object, when present, in its path state block.
contents.zh-CHS: 路径上的每个LSR在其路径状态块中记录DIFFSERV对象（如果存在）。

contents.text: If a DIFFSERV object is not present in the Path message, the LSR SHOULD interpret this as a request for an E-LSP using the Preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping'. However, for backward compatibility purposes, with other non-Diff-Serv Quality of Service options allowed by [RSVP_MPLS_TE] such as Integrated Services Controlled Load or Guaranteed Services, the LSR MAY support a configurable "override option". When this "override option" is configured, the LSR interprets a path message without a Diff-Serv object as a request for an LSP with such non-Diff-Serv Quality of Service.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果路径消息中不存在DIFFSERV对象，则LSR应使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”将其解释为对E-LSP的请求。然而，出于向后兼容性的目的，对于[RSVP_MPLS_TE]允许的其他非区分服务服务质量选项，例如集成服务控制负载或保证服务，LSR可以支持可配置的“覆盖选项”。配置此“覆盖选项”时，LSR将不带区分服务对象的路径消息解释为对具有此类非区分服务质量的LSP的请求。

contents.text: If a DIFFSERV object for an E-LSP containing no MAP entry is present in the Path message, the LSR MUST interpret this as a request for an E-LSP using the Preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping'. In particular, this allows an LSR with the "override option" configured to support E-LSPs with Preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping', simultaneously with LSPs with non-Diff-Serv Quality of Service.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果路径消息中存在不包含映射项的E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象，则LSR必须使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”将其解释为对E-LSP的请求。特别是，这允许具有“覆盖选项”的LSR配置为支持具有预配置“EXP<-->PHB映射”的电子LSP，同时支持具有非区分服务质量的LSP。

contents.text: If a DIFFSERV object for an E-LSP containing at least one MAP entry is present in the Path message, the LSR MUST interpret this as a request for an E-LSP with signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果路径消息中存在包含至少一个映射条目的E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象，则LSR必须将其解释为对带有信号“EXP<-->PHB mapping”的E-LSP的请求。

contents.text: If a DIFFSERV object for an L-LSP is present in the Path message, the LSR MUST interpret this as a request for an L-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果路径消息中存在L-LSP的DIFFSERV对象，则LSR必须将其解释为对L-LSP的请求。

contents.text: The destination LSR of an E-LSP or L-LSP responds to the Path message containing the LABEL_REQUEST object by sending a Resv message:
contents.zh-CHS: E-LSP或L-LSP的目标LSR通过发送Resv消息来响应包含LABEL_请求对象的Path消息：

contents.text: - with the LABEL object
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用标签对象

contents.text: - without a DIFFSERV object.
contents.zh-CHS: - 没有区分服务对象。

contents.text: Assuming the label request is accepted and a label is allocated, the Diff-Serv LSRs (sender, destination, intermediate nodes) must:
contents.zh-CHS: 假设接受标签请求并分配标签，则区分服务LSR（发送方、目的地、中间节点）必须：

contents.text: - update the Diff-Serv Context associated with the established LSPs in their ILM/FTN as specified in previous sections (incoming and outgoing label),
contents.zh-CHS: - 按照前面章节（传入和传出标签）中的规定，更新与ILM/FTN中已建立的LSP关联的区分服务上下文，

contents.text: - install the required Diff-Serv forwarding treatment (scheduling and dropping behavior) for this NHLFE (outgoing label).
contents.zh-CHS: - 为此NHLFE（传出标签）安装所需的区分服务转发处理（调度和丢弃行为）。

contents.text: An LSR that recognizes the DIFFSERV object and that receives a path message which contains the DIFFSERV object but which does not contain a LABEL_REQUEST object or which does not have a session type of LSP_Tunnel_IPv4, sends a PathErr towards the sender with the error code `Diff-Serv Error' and an error value of `Unexpected DIFFSERV object'. Those are defined below in section 5.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 识别DIFFSERV对象并接收包含DIFFSERV对象但不包含LABEL_请求对象或会话类型为LSP_Tunnel_IPv4的路径消息的LSR向发送方发送路径错误，错误代码为“DIFFSERV error”，错误值为“意外DIFFSERV object”。这些定义见下文第5.5节。

contents.text: An LSR receiving a Path message with the DIFFSERV object for E-LSP, which recognizes the DIFFSERV object but does not support the particular PHB encoded in one, or more, of the MAP entries, sends a PathErr towards the sender with the error code `Diff-Serv Error' and an error value of `Unsupported PHB'. Those are defined below in section 5.5.
contents.zh-CHS: LSR接收到带有用于E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象的路径消息，该消息识别DIFFSERV对象，但不支持在一个或多个映射条目中编码的特定PHB，向发送方发送路径错误，错误代码为“DIFFSERV error”，错误值为“Unsupported PHB”。这些定义见下文第5.5节。

contents.text: An LSR receiving a Path message with the DIFFSERV object for E-LSP, which recognizes the DIFFSERV object but determines that the signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping' is invalid, sends a PathErr towards the sender with the error code `Diff-Serv Error' and an error value of Invalid `EXP<-->PHB mapping'. Those are defined below in section 5.5. `The EXP<-->PHB mapping' signaled in the DIFFSERV Object for an E-LSP is invalid when:
contents.zh-CHS: LSR接收到带有用于E-LSP的DIFFSERV对象的路径消息，该消息识别DIFFSERV对象，但确定发信号的“EXP<-->PHB映射”无效，向发送方发送路径错误，错误代码为“DIFFSERV error”，错误值为无效的“EXP<-->PHB映射”。这些定义见下文第5.5节`在以下情况下，电子LSP的DIFFSERV对象中发出的EXP<-->PHB映射”无效：

contents.text: - the MAPnb field is not within the range 0 to 8 or
contents.zh-CHS: - MAPnb字段不在0到8的范围内，或者

contents.text: - a given EXP value appears in more than one MAP entry, or
contents.zh-CHS: - 给定的EXP值出现在多个映射条目中，或

contents.text: - the PHBID encoding is invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: - PHBID编码无效。

contents.text: An LSR receiving a Path message with the DIFFSERV object for L-LSP, which recognizes the DIFFSERV object but does not support the particular PSC encoded in the PSC field, sends a PathErr towards the sender with the error code `Diff-Serv Error' and an error value of `Unsupported PSC'. Those are defined below in section 5.5.
contents.zh-CHS: LSR通过L-LSP的DIFFSERV对象接收路径消息，该消息识别DIFFSERV对象，但不支持PSC字段中编码的特定PSC，向发送方发送路径错误，错误代码为“DIFFSERV error”，错误值为“Unsupported PSC”。这些定义见下文第5.5节。

contents.text: An LSR receiving a Path message with the DIFFSERV object, which recognizes the DIFFSERV object but that is unable to allocate the required per-LSP Diff-Serv context sends a PathErr with the error code "Diff-Serv Error" and the error value "Per-LSP context allocation failure". Those are defined below in section 5.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收到带有DIFFSERV对象的路径消息的LSR（识别DIFFSERV对象，但无法分配所需的每LSP DIFFSERV上下文）将发送一个路径错误，错误代码为“DIFFSERV error”，错误值为“每LSP上下文分配失败”。这些定义见下文第5.5节。

contents.text: A Diff-Serv LSR MUST handle the situations where the label request can not be accepted for reasons other than those already discussed in this section, in accordance with [RSVP_MPLS_TE] (e.g., reservation rejected by admission control, a label can not be associated).
contents.zh-CHS: Diff-Serv LSR必须根据[RSVP_MPLS_TE]（例如，接纳控制拒绝保留，标签无法关联）处理由于本节中已讨论原因以外的原因而无法接受标签请求的情况。

contents.text: 5.4 Non-support of the DIFFSERV Object
contents.zh-CHS: 5.4 不支持DIFFSERV对象

contents.text: An LSR that does not recognize the DIFFSERV object Class-Num MUST behave in accordance with the procedures specified in [RSVP] for an unknown Class-Num whose format is 0bbbbbbb i.e., it must send a PathErr with the error code `Unknown object class' toward the sender.
contents.zh-CHS: 不识别DIFFSERV对象类Num的LSR必须按照[RSVP]中为格式为0bbb的未知类Num指定的过程进行操作，即它必须向发送方发送错误代码为“unknown object Class”的PathErr。

contents.text: An LSR that recognize the DIFFSERV object Class-Num but does not recognize the DIFFSERV object C-Type, must behave in accordance with the procedures specified in [RSVP] for an unknown C-type i.e., it must send a PathErr with the error code `Unknown object C-Type' toward the sender.
contents.zh-CHS: 识别DIFFSERV对象类Num但不识别DIFFSERV对象C-Type的LSR必须按照[RSVP]中为未知C-Type指定的过程进行操作，即，它必须向发送方发送错误代码为“unknown object C-Type”的PathErr。

contents.text: In both situations, this causes the path set-up to fail. The sender should notify management that a L-LSP cannot be established and should possibly take action to retry LSP establishment without the DIFFSERV object (e.g., attempt to use E-LSPs with Preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping' as a fall-back strategy).
contents.zh-CHS: 在这两种情况下，这都会导致路径设置失败。发送方应通知管理层无法建立L-LSP，并可能采取措施在没有DIFFSERV对象的情况下重试LSP的建立（例如，尝试使用带有预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的e-LSP作为回退策略）。

contents.text: 5.5 Error Codes For Diff-Serv
contents.zh-CHS: 5.5 区分服务的错误代码

contents.text: In the procedures described above, certain errors must be reported as a `Diff-Serv Error'. The value of the `Diff-Serv Error' error code is 27.
contents.zh-CHS: 在上述过程中，某些错误必须报告为“Diff Serv Error”。“Diff Serv Error”错误代码的值为27。

contents.text: The following defines error values for the Diff-Serv Error:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下定义了Diff Serv错误的错误值：

contents.text: Value Error
contents.zh-CHS: 值错误

contents.text: 1 Unexpected DIFFSERV object 2 Unsupported PHB 3 Invalid `EXP<-->PHB mapping' 4 Unsupported PSC 5 Per-LSP context allocation failure
contents.zh-CHS: 1意外的DIFFSERV对象2不支持的PHB 3无效的'EXP<-->PHB映射'4不支持的PSC 5每LSP上下文分配失败

contents.text: 5.6 Intserv Service Type
contents.zh-CHS: 5.6 Intserv服务类型

contents.text: Both E-LSPs and L-LSPs can be established with or without bandwidth reservation.
contents.zh-CHS: E-LSP和L-LSP都可以在保留或不保留带宽的情况下建立。

contents.text: As specified in [RSVP_MPLS_TE], to establish an E-LSP or an L-LSP with bandwidth reservation, Int-Serv's Controlled Load service (or possibly Guaranteed Service) is used and the bandwidth is signaled in the SENDER_TSPEC (respectively FLOWSPEC) of the path (respectively Resv) message.
contents.zh-CHS: 如[RSVP_MPLS_TE]中所述，为了建立具有带宽保留的E-LSP或L-LSP，使用Int Serv的受控负载服务（或可能的保证服务），并在路径（分别为Resv）消息的发送方_TSPEC（分别为FLOWSPEC）中通知带宽。

contents.text: As specified in [RSVP_MPLS_TE],to establish an E-LSP or an L-LSP without bandwidth reservation, the Null Service specified in [NULL] is used.
contents.zh-CHS: 如[RSVP_MPLS_TE]中所述，为了在没有带宽预留的情况下建立E-LSP或L-LSP，使用[Null]中指定的Null服务。

contents.text: Note that this specification defines usage of E-LSPs and L-LSPs for support of the Diff-Serv service only. Regardless of the Intserv service (Controlled Load, Null Service, Guaranteed Service,...) and regardless of whether the reservation is with or without bandwidth reservation, E-LSPs and L-LSPs are defined here for support of Diff-Serv services. Support of Int-Serv services over an MPLS Diff-Serv backbone is outside the scope of this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，本规范定义了E-LSP和L-LSP的用法，仅用于支持区分服务。无论Intserv服务（受控负载、空服务、保证服务等）如何，也不管保留是否带有带宽保留，此处定义了E-LSP和L-LSP以支持区分服务。通过MPLS Diff Serv主干网支持Int Serv服务不在本规范的范围内。

contents.text: Note also that this specification does not concern itself with the DCLASS object defined in [DCLASS], since this object conveys information on DSCP values, which are not relevant inside the MPLS network.
contents.zh-CHS: 还请注意，本规范与[DCLASS]中定义的DCLASS对象无关，因为该对象传递有关DSCP值的信息，而这些值在MPLS网络中并不相关。

contents.text: 6. LDP Extensions for Diff-Serv Support
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 用于区分服务支持的LDP扩展

contents.text: The MPLS architecture does not assume a single label distribution protocol. [LDP] defines the Label Distribution Protocol and its usage for establishment of label switched paths (LSPs) in MPLS networks. This section specifies the extensions to LDP to establish LSPs supporting Differentiated Services in MPLS networks.
contents.zh-CHS: MPLS体系结构不采用单标签分发协议。[LDP]定义了标签分发协议及其在MPLS网络中建立标签交换路径（LSP）的用途。本节规定了LDP的扩展，以在MPLS网络中建立支持区分服务的LSP。

contents.text: One new LDP TLV is defined in this document:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中定义了一个新的LDP TLV：

contents.text: - the Diff-Serv TLV
contents.zh-CHS: - 区分服务TLV

contents.text: Detailed description of this TLV is provided below.
contents.zh-CHS: 下文提供了该TLV的详细说明。

contents.text: The new Diff-Serv TLV is optional with respect to LDP. A Diff-Serv capable LSR supporting E-LSPs which uses the Preconfigured `EXP<-- >PHB mapping' in compliance with this specification MAY support the Diff-Serv TLV. A Diff-Serv capable LSR supporting E-LSPs which uses the signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping' in compliance with this specification MUST support the Diff-Serv TLV. A Diff-Serv capable LSR supporting L-LSPs in compliance with this specification MUST support the Diff-Serv TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: 新的Diff-Serv TLV对于LDP是可选的。支持E-LSP的具有区分服务功能的LSR（使用符合本规范的预配置“EXP<-->PHB映射”）可支持区分服务TLV。支持E-LSP的具有区分服务功能的LSR（使用符合本规范的信号“EXP<-->PHB映射”）必须支持区分服务TLV。支持符合本规范的L-LSP的具有区分服务功能的LSR必须支持区分服务TLV。

contents.text: 6.1 Diff-Serv TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1 区分服务TLV

contents.text: The Diff-Serv TLV has the following formats:
contents.zh-CHS: Diff-Serv TLV具有以下格式：

contents.text: Diff-Serv TLV for an E-LSP:
contents.zh-CHS: E-LSP的区分服务TLV：

contents.text: T:1 bit LSP Type. This is set to 0 for an E-LSP
contents.zh-CHS: T:1位LSP类型。这对于E-LSP设置为0

contents.text: Reserved : 27 bits This field is reserved. It must be set to zero on transmission and must be ignored on receipt.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：27位此字段保留。传输时必须将其设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: MAPnb : 4 bits Indicates the number of MAP entries included in the DIFFSERV Object. This can be set to any value from 1 to 8.
contents.zh-CHS: MAPnb:4位表示DIFFSERV对象中包含的映射项的数量。这可以设置为1到8之间的任何值。

contents.text: MAP : 32 bits Each MAP entry defines the mapping between one EXP field value and one PHB. The MAP entry has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: MAP:32位每个MAP条目定义一个EXP字段值和一个PHB之间的映射。地图条目具有以下格式：

contents.text: Reserved : 13 bits This field is reserved. It must be set to zero on transmission and must be ignored on receipt.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：13位此字段保留。传输时必须将其设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: EXP : 3 bits This field contains the value of the EXP field for the `EXP<-->PHB mapping' defined in this MAP entry.
contents.zh-CHS: EXP:3位此字段包含此映射项中定义的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的EXP字段的值。

contents.text: PHBID : 16 bits This field contains the PHBID of the PHB for the `EXP<-->PHB mapping' defined in this MAP entry. The PHBID is encoded as specified in [PHBID].
contents.zh-CHS: PHBID：16位此字段包含此映射项中定义的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的PHB的PHBID。PHBID按照[PHBID]中的规定进行编码。

contents.text: Diff-Serv TLV for an L-LSP:
contents.zh-CHS: L-LSP的区分服务TLV：

contents.text: T:1 bit LSP Type. This is set to 1 for an L-LSP
contents.zh-CHS: T:1位LSP类型。对于L-LSP，该值设置为1

contents.text: Reserved : 15 bits This field is reserved. It must be set to zero on transmission and must be ignored on receipt.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：15位此字段保留。传输时必须将其设置为零，接收时必须忽略。

contents.text: PSC : 16 bits The PSC indicates a PHB Scheduling Class to be supported by the LSP. The PSC is encoded as specified in [PHBID].
contents.zh-CHS: PSC:16位PSC表示LSP支持的PHB调度类。PSC按照[PHBID]中的规定进行编码。

contents.text: 6.2 Diff-Serv Status Code Values
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2 区分服务状态代码值

contents.text: The following values are defined for the Status Code field of the Status TLV:
contents.zh-CHS: 为状态TLV的状态代码字段定义了以下值：

contents.text: Status Code E Status Data
contents.zh-CHS: 状态代码E状态数据

contents.text: Unexpected Diff-Serv TLV 0 0x01000001 Unsupported PHB 0 0x01000002 Invalid `EXP<-->PHB mapping' 0 0x01000003 Unsupported PSC 0 0x01000004 Per-LSP context allocation failure 0 0x01000005
contents.zh-CHS: 意外的区分服务TLV 0 0x01000001不支持的PHB 0 0x01000002无效的'EXP<-->PHB映射'0 0x01000003不支持的PSC 0 0x01000004每个LSP上下文分配失败0 0x01000005

contents.text: 6.3 Diff-Serv Related LDP Messages
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3 区分服务相关LDP消息

contents.text: 6.3.1 Label Request Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3.1 标签请求消息

contents.text: The format of the Label Request message is extended as follows, to optionally include the Diff-Serv TLV:
contents.zh-CHS: 标签请求消息的格式扩展如下，以可选地包括区分服务TLV：

contents.text: 6.3.2 Label Mapping Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3.2 标签映射消息

contents.text: The format of the Label Mapping message is extended as follows, to optionally include the Diff-Serv TLV:
contents.zh-CHS: 标签映射消息的格式扩展如下，以可选地包括区分服务TLV：

contents.text: 6.3.3 Label Release Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3.3 标签发布消息

contents.text: The format of the Label Release message is extended as follows, to optionally include the Status TLV:
contents.zh-CHS: 标签发布消息的格式扩展如下，可以选择包括状态TLV：

contents.text: 6.3.4 Notification Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3.4 通知消息

contents.text: The format of the Notification message is extended as follows, to optionally include the Diff-Serv TLV:
contents.zh-CHS: 通知消息的格式扩展如下，以可选地包括Diff-Serv TLV：

contents.text: 6.4 Handling of the Diff-Serv TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4 区分服务TLV的处理

contents.text: 6.4.1 Handling of the Diff-Serv TLV in Downstream Unsolicited Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4.1 在下游主动模式下处理Diff-Serv TLV

contents.text: This section describes operations when the Downstream Unsolicited Mode is used.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述使用下游非请求模式时的操作。

contents.text: When allocating a label for an E-LSP which is to use the preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping', a downstream Diff-Serv LSR issues a Label Mapping message without the Diff-Serv TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: 为要使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的E-LSP分配标签时，下游Diff-Serv LSR会发出标签映射消息，而不发送Diff-Serv TLV。

contents.text: When allocating a label for an E-LSP which is to use a signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping', a downstream Diff-Serv LSR issues a Label Mapping message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an E-LSP which contains one MAP entry for each EXP value to be supported on this E-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 当为要使用信号“EXP<-->PHB映射”的E-LSP分配标签时，下游Diff-Serv LSR向E-LSP发出标签映射消息，其中包含该E-LSP上支持的每个EXP值的一个映射条目。

contents.text: When allocating a label for an L-LSP, a downstream Diff-Serv LSR issues a Label Mapping message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an L-LSP which contains the PHB Scheduling Class (PSC) to be supported on this L-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 为L-LSP分配标签时，下游Diff-Serv LSR向L-LSP的Diff-Serv TLV发出标签映射消息，该L-LSP包含该L-LSP上支持的PHB调度类（PSC）。

contents.text: Assuming the label set-up is successful, the downstream and upstream LSRs must:
contents.zh-CHS: 假设标签设置成功，下游和上游LSR必须：

contents.text: - update the Diff-Serv Context associated with the established LSPs in their ILM/FTN as specified in previous sections (incoming and outgoing label),
contents.zh-CHS: - 按照前面章节（传入和传出标签）中的规定，更新与ILM/FTN中已建立的LSP关联的区分服务上下文，

contents.text: - install the required Diff-Serv forwarding treatment (scheduling and dropping behavior) for this NHLFE (outgoing label).
contents.zh-CHS: - 为此NHLFE（传出标签）安装所需的区分服务转发处理（调度和丢弃行为）。

contents.text: An upstream Diff-Serv LSR receiving a Label Mapping message with multiple Diff-Serv TLVs only considers the first one as meaningful. The LSR must ignore and not forward the subsequent Diff-Serv TLV(s).
contents.zh-CHS: 上游Diff-Serv LSR接收到带有多个Diff-Serv TLV的标签映射消息时，仅认为第一个有意义。LSR必须忽略且不转发后续的区分服务TLV。

contents.text: An upstream Diff-Serv LSR which receives a Label Mapping message, with the Diff-Serv TLV for an E-LSP and does not support the particular PHB encoded in one or more of the MAP entries, must reject the mapping by sending a Label Release message which includes the Label TLV and the Status TLV with a Status Code of `Unsupported PHB'.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收标签映射消息的上游Diff-Serv LSR，带有E-LSP的Diff-Serv TLV，并且不支持在一个或多个映射条目中编码的特定PHB，必须通过发送标签释放消息来拒绝映射，该消息包括标签TLV和状态代码为“Unsupported PHB”的状态TLV。

contents.text: An upstream Diff-Serv LSR receiving a Label Mapping message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an E-LSP and determining that the signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping' is invalid, must reject the mapping by sending a Label Release message which includes the Label TLV and the Status TLV with a Status Code of Invalid `EXP<-->PHB mapping'. The `EXP<-->PHB mapping' signaled in the DIFFSERV Object for an E-LSP is invalid when:
contents.zh-CHS: 上游Diff-Serv LSR接收到带有E-LSP的Diff-Serv TLV的标签映射消息，并确定发信号的“EXP<-->PHB映射”无效，必须通过发送标签释放消息来拒绝映射，该消息包括标签TLV和状态代码为“EXP<-->PHB映射”的状态TLV。在以下情况下，电子LSP的DIFFSERV对象中发出的“EXP<-->PHB映射”无效：

contents.text: - the MAPnb field is not within the range 1 to 8, or
contents.zh-CHS: - MAPnb字段不在1到8的范围内，或

contents.text: - a given EXP value appears in more than one MAP entry, or
contents.zh-CHS: - 给定的EXP值出现在多个映射条目中，或

contents.text: - the PHBID encoding is invalid
contents.zh-CHS: - PHBID编码无效

contents.text: An upstream Diff-Serv LSR receiving a Label Mapping message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an L-LSP containing a PSC value which is not supported, must reject the mapping by sending a Label Release message which includes the Label TLV and the Status TLV with a Status Code of `Unsupported PSC'.
contents.zh-CHS: 上游Diff-Serv LSR接收到L-LSP的标签映射消息，其中Diff-Serv TLV包含不受支持的PSC值，必须通过发送标签释放消息拒绝映射，该消息包括标签TLV和状态代码为“不受支持的PSC”的状态TLV。

contents.text: 6.4.2 Handling of the Diff-Serv TLV in Downstream on Demand Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4.2 在下游按需模式下处理Diff-Serv TLV

contents.text: This section describes operations when the Downstream on Demand Mode is used.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了使用下游按需模式时的操作。

contents.text: When requesting a label for an E-LSP which is to use the preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping', an upstream Diff-Serv LSR sends a Label Request message without the Diff-Serv TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: 当为要使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的E-LSP请求标签时，上游Diff-Serv LSR发送标签请求消息，而不发送Diff-Serv TLV。

contents.text: When requesting a label for an E-LSP which is to use a signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping', an upstream Diff-Serv LSR sends a Label Request message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an E-LSP which contains one MAP entry for each EXP value to be supported on this E-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 当为使用信号“EXP<-->PHB映射”的E-LSP请求标签时，上游Diff-Serv LSR为E-LSP发送带有Diff-Serv TLV的标签请求消息，其中包含该E-LSP上支持的每个EXP值的一个映射条目。

contents.text: When requesting a label for an L-LSP, an upstream Diff-Serv LSR sends a Label Request message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an L-LSP which contains the PSC to be supported on this L-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: 当请求L-LSP的标签时，上游Diff-Serv LSR通过Diff-Serv TLV发送L-LSP的标签请求消息，该L-LSP包含该L-LSP上支持的PSC。

contents.text: A downstream Diff-Serv LSR sending a Label Mapping message in response to a Label Request message for an E-LSP or an L-LSP must not include a Diff-Serv TLV in this Label Mapping message. Assuming the label set-up is successful, the downstream and upstream LSRs must:
contents.zh-CHS: 下游Diff-Serv LSR发送标签映射消息以响应E-LSP或L-LSP的标签请求消息时，不得在此标签映射消息中包含Diff-Serv TLV。假设标签设置成功，下游和上游LSR必须：

contents.text: - update the Diff-Serv Context associated with the established LSPs in their ILM/FTN as specified in previous sections (incoming and outgoing label),
contents.zh-CHS: - 按照前面章节（传入和传出标签）中的规定，更新与ILM/FTN中已建立的LSP关联的区分服务上下文，

contents.text: - install the required Diff-Serv forwarding treatment (scheduling and dropping behavior) for this NHLFE (outgoing label).
contents.zh-CHS: - 为此NHLFE（传出标签）安装所需的区分服务转发处理（调度和丢弃行为）。

contents.text: An upstream Diff-Serv LSR receiving a Label Mapping message containing a Diff-Serv TLV in response to its Label Request message, must reject the label mapping by sending a Label Release message which includes the Label TLV and the Status TLV with a Status Code of `Unexpected Diff-Serv TLV'.
contents.zh-CHS: 上游Diff-Serv LSR接收到包含Diff-Serv TLV的标签映射消息以响应其标签请求消息时，必须通过发送包含标签TLV和状态TLV且状态代码为“意外Diff-Serv TLV”的标签释放消息来拒绝标签映射。

contents.text: A downstream Diff-Serv LSR receiving a Label Request message with multiple Diff-Serv TLVs only considers the first one as meaningful. The LSR must ignore and not forward the subsequent Diff-Serv TLV(s).
contents.zh-CHS: 下游Diff-Serv LSR接收到带有多个Diff-Serv TLV的标签请求消息时，仅认为第一个有意义。LSR必须忽略且不转发后续的区分服务TLV。

contents.text: A downstream Diff-Serv LSR which receives a Label Request message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an E-LSP and does not support the particular PHB encoded in one (or more) of the MAP entries, must reject the request by sending a Notification message which includes the Status TLV with a Status Code of `Unsupported PHB'.
contents.zh-CHS: 下游Diff-Serv LSR接收带有E-LSP的Diff-Serv TLV的标签请求消息，并且不支持在一个（或多个）映射条目中编码的特定PHB，必须通过发送包含状态代码为“Unsupported PHB”的状态TLV的通知消息来拒绝请求。

contents.text: A downstream Diff-Serv LSR receiving a Label Request message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an E-LSP and determining that the signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping' is invalid, must reject the request by sending a Notification message which includes the Status TLV with a Status Code of Invalid `EXP<-->PHB mapping'. The `EXP<-->PHB mapping' signaled in the DIFFSERV TLV for an E-LSP is invalid when:
contents.zh-CHS: 下游Diff-Serv LSR接收带有E-LSP的Diff-Serv TLV的标签请求消息，并确定发信号的“EXP<-->PHB映射”无效，必须通过发送包含状态代码为“EXP<-->PHB映射”的状态TLV的通知消息来拒绝该请求。在以下情况下，DIFFSERV TLV中针对E-LSP发出的“EXP<-->PHB映射”无效：

contents.text: - the MAPnb field is not within the range 1 to 8, or
contents.zh-CHS: - MAPnb字段不在1到8的范围内，或

contents.text: - a given EXP value appears in more than one MAP entry, or
contents.zh-CHS: - 给定的EXP值出现在多个映射条目中，或

contents.text: - the PHBID encoding is invalid
contents.zh-CHS: - PHBID编码无效

contents.text: A downstream Diff-Serv LSR receiving a Label Request message with the Diff-Serv TLV for an L-LSP containing a PSC value which is not supported, must reject the request by sending a Notification message which includes the Status TLV with a Status Code of `Unsupported PSC'.
contents.zh-CHS: 下游Diff-Serv LSR接收到L-LSP的标签请求消息，其中Diff-Serv TLV包含不受支持的PSC值，必须通过发送通知消息拒绝该请求，该通知消息包括状态TLV，状态代码为“Unsupported PSC”。

contents.text: A downstream Diff-Serv LSR that recognizes the Diff-Serv TLV Type in a Label Request message but is unable to allocate the required per-LSP context information, must reject the request sending a Notification message which includes the Status TLV with a Status Code of `Per-LSP context allocation failure'.
contents.zh-CHS: 识别标签请求消息中的Diff Serv TLV类型但无法分配所需的每LSP上下文信息的下游Diff Serv LSR必须拒绝发送通知消息的请求，该通知消息包括状态代码为“每LSP上下文分配失败”的状态TLV。

contents.text: A downstream Diff-Serv LSR that recognizes the Diff-Serv TLV Type in a Label Request message and supports the requested PSC but is not able to satisfy the label request for other reasons (e.g., no label available), must send a Notification message in accordance with existing LDP procedures [LDP] (e.g., with a `No Label Resource' Status Code). This Notification message must include the requested Diff-Serv TLV.
contents.zh-CHS: 下游Diff-Serv LSR识别标签请求消息中的Diff-Serv TLV类型，并支持请求的PSC，但由于其他原因（例如，没有可用的标签）无法满足标签请求，必须根据现有LDP程序[LDP]发送通知消息（例如，“没有标签资源”状态代码）。此通知消息必须包括请求的Diff Serv TLV。

contents.text: 6.5 Non-Handling of the Diff-Serv TLV
contents.zh-CHS: 6.5 不处理区分服务TLV

contents.text: An LSR that does not recognize the Diff-Serv TLV Type, on receipt of a Label Request message or a Label Mapping message containing the Diff-Serv TLV, must behave in accordance with the procedures specified in [LDP] for an unknown TLV whose U Bit and F Bit are set to 0 i.e., it must ignore the message, return a Notification message with `Unknown TLV' Status.
contents.zh-CHS: 在接收到标签请求消息或包含区分服务TLV的标签映射消息时，不识别区分服务TLV类型的LSR必须按照[LDP]中为U位和F位设置为0的未知TLV指定的程序进行操作，即它必须忽略该消息，返回状态为“未知TLV”的通知消息。

contents.text: 6.6 Bandwidth Information
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6 带宽信息

contents.text: Bandwidth information may also be signaled at the establishment time of E-LSP and L-LSP, for instance for the purpose of Traffic Engineering, using the Traffic Parameters TLV as described in [MPLS CR LDP].
contents.zh-CHS: 带宽信息也可以在E-LSP和L-LSP的建立时发信号通知，例如为了流量工程的目的，使用如MPLS-CR-LDP中所述的流量参数TLV。

contents.text: 7. MPLS Support of Diff-Serv over PPP, LAN, Non-LC-ATM and Non-LC-FR Interfaces
contents.zh-CHS: 7. MPLS支持PPP、LAN、非LC ATM和非LC FR接口上的区分服务

contents.text: The general operations for MPLS support of Diff-Serv, including label forwarding and LSP setup operations are specified in the previous sections. This section describes the specific operations required for MPLS support of Diff-Serv over PPP interfaces, LAN interfaces, ATM Interfaces which are not label controlled and Frame Relay interfaces which are not label controlled.
contents.zh-CHS: 区分服务的MPLS支持的一般操作，包括标签转发和LSP设置操作，在前面的章节中有详细说明。本节描述了MPLS支持PPP上的区分服务接口、LAN接口、不受标签控制的ATM接口和不受标签控制的帧中继接口所需的具体操作。

contents.text: On these interfaces, this specification allows any of the following LSP combinations per FEC:
contents.zh-CHS: 在这些接口上，本规范允许每个FEC使用以下任一LSP组合：

contents.text: - Zero or any number of E-LSP, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 零或任意数量的E-LSP，以及

contents.text: - Zero or any number of L-LSPs.
contents.zh-CHS: - 零或任意数量的L-LSP。

contents.text: A Diff-Serv capable LSR MUST support E-LSPs which use preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping' over these interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持区分服务的LSR必须支持在这些接口上使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”的E-LSP。

contents.text: A Diff-Serv capable LSR MAY support E-LSPs which use signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping' and L-LSPs over these interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 具有区分服务功能的LSR可支持通过这些接口使用信号“EXP<-->PHB映射”和L-LSP的E-LSP。

contents.text: 8. MPLS Support of Diff-Serv over LC-ATM Interfaces
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 基于LC-ATM接口的区分服务MPLS支持

contents.text: This section describes the specific operations required for MPLS support of Diff-Serv over label switching controlled ATM (LC-ATM) interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了MPLS支持标签交换控制ATM（LC-ATM）接口上的区分服务所需的具体操作。

contents.text: This document allows any number of L-LSPs per FEC within an MPLS ATM Diff-Serv domain. E-LSPs are not supported over LC-ATM interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件允许在MPLS ATM区分服务域内每个FEC有任意数量的L-LSP。LC-ATM接口不支持E-LSP。

contents.text: 8.1 Use of ATM Traffic Classes and Traffic Management mechanisms
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1 ATM流量类别和流量管理机制的使用

contents.text: The use of the "ATM service categories" specified by the ATM Forum, of the "ATM Transfer Capabilities" specified by the ITU-T or of vendor specific ATM traffic classes is outside of the scope of this specification. The only requirement for compliant implementation is that the forwarding behavior experienced by a Behavior Aggregate forwarded over an L-LSP by the ATM LSR MUST be compliant with the corresponding Diff-Serv PHB specifications.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用ATM论坛指定的“ATM服务类别”、ITU-T指定的“ATM传输能力”或供应商特定的ATM业务类别不在本规范的范围内。兼容实现的唯一要求是，ATM LSR通过L-LSP转发的行为聚合所经历的转发行为必须符合相应的区分服务PHB规范。

contents.text: Since there is only one bit (CLP) for encoding the PHB drop precedence value over ATM links, only two different drop precedence levels are supported in ATM LSRs. Sections 4.2.2 and 4.4.2 define how the three drop precedence levels of the AFn Ordered Aggregates are mapped to these two ATM drop precedence levels. This mapping is in accordance with the requirements specified in [DIFF_AF] for the case when only two drop precedence levels are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于只有一位（CLP）用于编码ATM链路上的PHB丢弃优先级值，因此ATM LSR中只支持两种不同的丢弃优先级。第4.2.2节和第4.4.2节定义了AFn有序聚合的三个丢弃优先级如何映射到这两个ATM丢弃优先级。该映射符合[DIFF_AF]中针对仅支持两个丢弃优先级的情况规定的要求。

contents.text: To avoid discarding parts of the packets, frame discard mechanisms, such as Early Packet Discard (EPD) (see [ATMF_TM]) SHOULD be enabled in the ATM-LSRs for all PHBs described in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 为避免丢弃部分数据包，应在本文档中描述的所有PHB的ATM LSR中启用帧丢弃机制，如早期数据包丢弃（EPD）（参见[ATMF_TM]）。

contents.text: 8.2 LSR Implementation With LC-ATM Interfaces
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2 利用LC-ATM接口实现LSR

contents.text: A Diff-Serv capable LSR MUST support L-LSPs over LC-ATM interfaces. This specification assumes that Edge-LSRs of the ATM-LSR domain use the "shim header" encapsulation method defined in [MPLS_ATM]. Operations without the "shim header" encapsulation are outside the scope of this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 具有区分服务功能的LSR必须支持LC-ATM接口上的L-LSP。本规范假设ATM-LSR域的边缘LSR使用[MPLS_ATM]中定义的“垫片头”封装方法。没有“垫片头”封装的操作不在本规范的范围内。

contents.text: 9. MPLS Support of Diff-Serv over LC-FR Interfaces
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 基于LC-FR接口的区分服务MPLS支持

contents.text: This section describes the specific operations required for MPLS support of Diff-Serv over label switching controlled Frame Relay (LC-FR) interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了MPLS支持标签交换控制帧中继（LC-FR）接口上的区分服务所需的具体操作。

contents.text: This document allows any number of L-LSPs per FEC within an MPLS Frame Relay Diff-Serv domain. E-LSPs are not supported over LC-FR interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档允许在MPLS帧中继区分服务域内每个FEC有任意数量的L-LSP。LC-FR接口不支持E-LSP。

contents.text: 9.1 Use of Frame Relay Traffic parameters and Traffic Management mechanisms
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1 帧中继流量参数和流量管理机制的使用

contents.text: The use of the Frame Relay traffic parameters as specified by ITU-T and Frame Relay-Forum or of vendor specific Frame Relay traffic management mechanisms is outside of the scope of this specification. The only requirement for compliant implementation is that the forwarding behavior experienced by a Behavior Aggregate forwarded over an L-LSP by the Frame Relay LSR MUST be compliant with the corresponding Diff-Serv PHB specifications.
contents.zh-CHS: ITU-T和帧中继论坛规定的帧中继流量参数或特定于供应商的帧中继流量管理机制的使用不在本规范的范围内。兼容实现的唯一要求是，由帧中继LSR通过L-LSP转发的行为聚合所经历的转发行为必须符合相应的Diff-Serv PHB规范。

contents.text: Since there is only one bit (DE) for encoding the PHB drop precedence value over Frame Relay links, only two different drop precedence levels are supported in Frame Relay LSRs. Sections 4.2.3 and 4.4.3 define how the three drop precedence levels of the AFn Ordered Aggregates are mapped to these two Frame Relay drop precedence levels. This mapping is in accordance with the requirements specified in [DIFF_AF] for the case when only two drop precedence levels are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于只有一位（DE）用于编码帧中继链路上的PHB丢弃优先级值，因此帧中继LSR中只支持两种不同的丢弃优先级。第4.2.3节和第4.4.3节定义了AFn有序聚合的三个丢弃优先级如何映射到这两个帧中继丢弃优先级。该映射符合[DIFF_AF]中针对仅支持两个丢弃优先级的情况规定的要求。

contents.text: 9.2 LSR Implementation With LC-FR Interfaces
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2 使用LC-FR接口实现LSR

contents.text: A Diff-Serv capable LSR MUST support L-LSPs over LC-Frame Relay interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 具有区分服务功能的LSR必须支持LC帧中继接口上的L-LSP。

contents.text: This specification assumes that Edge-LSRs of the FR-LSR domain use the "generic encapsulation" method as recommended in [MPLS_FR]. Operations without the "generic encapsulation" are outside the scope of this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范假设FR-LSR域的边缘LSR使用[MPLS_FR]中建议的“通用封装”方法。没有“通用封装”的操作不在本规范的范围内。

contents.text: 10. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 10. IANA考虑

contents.text: This document defines a number of objects with implications for IANA.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了许多对IANA有影响的对象。

contents.text: This document defines in section 5.2 a new RSVP object, the DIFFSERV object. This object required a number from the space defined in [RSVP] for those objects which, if not understood, cause the entire RSVP message to be rejected with an error code of "Unknown Object Class". Such objects are identified by a zero in the most significant bit of the class number. Within that space, this object required a number from the "IETF Consensus" space. "65" has been allocated by IANA for the DIFFSERV object.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档在第5.2节中定义了一个新的RSVP对象，即DIFFSERV对象。此对象需要[RSVP]中为这些对象定义的空格中的数字，如果不理解这些数字，将导致整个RSVP消息被拒绝，错误代码为“Unknown object Class”。此类对象由类编号最有效位的零标识。在该空间内，该物体需要来自“IETF共识”空间的数字。IANA已为DIFFSERV对象分配了“65”。

contents.text: This document defines in section 5.5 a new RSVP error code, "Diffserv Error". Error code "27" has been assigned by IANA to the "Diffserv Error". This document defines values 1 through 5 of the value field to be used within the ERROR_SPEC object for this error code. Future allocations of values in this space should be handled by IANA using the First Come First Served policy defined in [IANA].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件在第5.5节中定义了一个新的RSVP错误代码“Diffserv error”。IANA已将错误代码“27”分配给“Diffserv错误”。本文档定义了要在此错误代码的ERROR_SPEC对象中使用的值字段的值1到5。IANA应使用[IANA]中定义的先到先得策略处理该空间中未来的值分配。

contents.text: This document defines in section 6.1 a new LDP TLV, the Diffserv TLV. The number for this TLV has been assigned by working group consensus according to the policies defined in [LDP].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件在第6.1节中定义了一种新的LDP TLV，即Diffserv TLV。根据[LDP]中定义的政策，工作组一致同意分配该TLV的编号。

contents.text: This document defines in section 6.2 five new LDP Status Code values for Diffserv-related error conditions. The values for the Status Code have been assigned by working group consensus according to the policies defined in [LDP].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件在第6.2节中定义了区分服务相关错误条件的五个新LDP状态码值。根据[LDP]中定义的政策，工作组一致同意分配状态代码的值。

contents.text: 11. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document does not introduce any new security issues beyond those inherent in Diff-Serv, MPLS and RSVP, and may use the same mechanisms proposed for those technologies.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了Diff-Serv、MPLS和RSVP中固有的安全问题外，本文档不会引入任何新的安全问题，并可能使用针对这些技术提出的相同机制。

contents.text: 12. Acknowledgments
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 致谢

contents.text: This document has benefited from discussions with Eric Rosen, Angela Chiu and Carol Iturralde. It has also borrowed from the work done by D. Black regarding Diff-Serv and IP Tunnels interaction.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件得益于与Eric Rosen、Angela Chiu和Carol Iturralde的讨论。它还借鉴了D.Black在区分服务和IP隧道交互方面所做的工作。

contents.text: APPENDIX A. Example Deployment Scenarios
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.部署场景示例

contents.text: This section does not provide additional specification and is only here to provide examples of how this flexible approach for Diff-Serv support over MPLS may be deployed. Pros and cons of various deployment options for particular environments are beyond the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节不提供其他规范，仅提供如何部署MPLS上区分服务支持的灵活方法的示例。针对特定环境的各种部署选项的优缺点超出了本文档的范围。

contents.text: A.1 Scenario 1: 8 (or fewer) BAs, no Traffic Engineering, no MPLS Protection
contents.zh-CHS: A.1场景1:8（或更少）BAs，无流量工程，无MPLS保护

contents.text: A Service Provider running 8 (or fewer) BAs over MPLS, not performing Traffic engineering, not using MPLS protection and using MPLS Shim Header encapsulation in his/her network, may elect to run Diff-Serv over MPLS using a single E-LSP per FEC established via LDP. Furthermore the Service Provider may elect to use the preconfigured `EXP<-->PHB mapping'.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过MPLS运行8个（或更少）BAs、不执行流量工程、不使用MPLS保护和在其网络中使用MPLS垫片报头封装的服务提供商可以选择使用通过LDP建立的每个FEC的单个E-LSP通过MPLS运行区分服务。此外，服务提供商可以选择使用预配置的“EXP<-->PHB映射”。

contents.text: Operations can be summarized as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 业务可总结如下：

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, the bi-directional mapping between each PHB and a value of the EXP field (e.g., 000<-->AF11, 001<-->AF12, 010<-->AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR配置每个PHB和EXP字段值之间的双向映射（例如，000<-->AF11、001<-->AF12、010<-->AF13）

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC (e.g., bandwidth allocated to AF1) and the dropping behavior for each PHB (e.g., drop profile for AF11, AF12, AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置每个PSC的调度行为（例如，分配给AF1的带宽）和每个PHB的丢弃行为（例如，AF11、AF12、AF13的丢弃配置文件）

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of a single E-LSP per FEC using LDP in accordance with the specification above (i.e., no Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages to implicitly indicate that the LSP is an E-LSP and that it uses the preconfigured mapping)
contents.zh-CHS: - 根据上述规范，使用LDP为每个FEC建立单个E-LSP的LSRs信号（即，LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中没有Diff-Serv TLV，以隐式指示LSP是E-LSP且其使用预配置映射）

contents.text: A.2 Scenario 2: More than 8 BAs, no Traffic Engineering, no MPLS Protection
contents.zh-CHS: A.2场景2：超过8个BAs，无流量工程，无MPLS保护

contents.text: A Service Provider running more than 8 BAs over MPLS, not performing Traffic Engineering, not using MPLS protection and using MPLS Shim encapsulation in his/her network may elect to run Diff-Serv over MPLS using for each FEC:
contents.zh-CHS: 通过MPLS运行8个以上BAs、不执行流量工程、不使用MPLS保护以及在其网络中使用MPLS垫片封装的服务提供商可以选择通过MPLS为每个FEC运行区分服务：

contents.text: - one E-LSP established via LDP and using the preconfigured mapping to support a set of 8 (or less) BAs, AND
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过LDP建立一个E-LSP，并使用预配置映射来支持一组8个（或更少）BAs，以及

contents.text: - one L-LSP per <FEC,OA> established via LDP for support of the other BAs.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过LDP为每个<FEC，OA>建立一个L-LSP，以支持其他BAs。

contents.text: Operations can be summarized as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 业务可总结如下：

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR the bi-directional mapping between each PHB and a value of the EXP field for the BAs transported over the E-LSP
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR配置每个PHB和通过E-LSP传输的BAs的EXP字段值之间的双向映射

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC supported over the E-LSP and the dropping behavior for each corresponding PHB
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置E-LSP支持的每个PSC的调度行为以及每个对应PHB的丢弃行为

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC supported over the L-LSPs and the dropping behavior for each corresponding PHB
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置L-LSP支持的每个PSC的调度行为以及每个对应PHB的丢弃行为

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of a single E-LSP per FEC for the set of E-LSP transported BAs using LDP as specified above (i.e., no Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages to implicitly indicate that the LSP is an E-LSP and that it uses the preconfigured mapping)
contents.zh-CHS: - LSRs信号为使用如上所述LDP传输的一组E-LSP BAs的每个FEC建立单个E-LSP（即，LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中没有Diff-Serv TLV，以隐式指示LSP是E-LSP并且它使用预配置的映射）

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of one L-LSP per <FEC,OA> for the other BAs using LDP as specified above (i.e., Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages to indicate the L-LSP's PSC).
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用如上所述的LDP（即，LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中的Diff-Serv TLV，用于指示L-LSP的PSC）为另一个BAs的每个<FEC，OA>建立一个L-LSP的LSRs信号。

contents.text: A.3 Scenario 3: 8 (or fewer) BAs, Aggregate Traffic Engineering, Aggregate MPLS Protection
contents.zh-CHS: A.3场景3:8（或更少）BAs、聚合流量工程、聚合MPLS保护

contents.text: A Service Provider running 8 (or fewer) BAs over MPLS, performing aggregate Traffic Engineering (i.e., performing a single common path selection for all BAs), using aggregate MPLS protection (i.e., restoring service to all PSCs jointly) and using MPLS Shim Header encapsulation in his/her network, may elect to run Diff-Serv over MPLS using a single E-LSP per FEC established via RSVP [RSVP_MPLS_TE] or CR-LDP [CR-LDP_MPLS_TE] and using the preconfigured mapping.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过MPLS运行8个（或更少）BAs的服务提供商，执行聚合流量工程（即，为所有BAs执行单个公共路径选择），使用聚合MPLS保护（即，联合将服务恢复到所有PSC），并在其网络中使用MPLS垫片头封装，可以选择使用通过RSVP[RSVP_MPLS_TE]或CR-LDP[CR-LDP_MPLS_TE]建立的每个FEC的单个E-LSP并使用预配置的映射在MPLS上运行区分服务。

contents.text: Operations can be summarized as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 业务可总结如下：

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR the bi-directional mapping between each PHB and a value of the EXP field (e.g., 000<-->AF11, 001<-->AF12, 010<-->AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR配置每个PHB和EXP字段值之间的双向映射（例如，000<-->AF11、001<-->AF12、010<-->AF13）

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC (e.g., bandwidth allocated to AF1) and the dropping behavior for each PHB (eg drop profile for AF11, AF12, AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置每个PSC的调度行为（例如，分配给AF1的带宽）和每个PHB的丢弃行为（例如AF11、AF12、AF13的丢弃配置文件）

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of a single E-LSP per FEC which will use the preconfigured mapping:
contents.zh-CHS: - 每个FEC的LSRs信号建立一个E-LSP，将使用预配置映射：

contents.text: * using the RSVP protocol as specified above (i.e., no DIFFSERV RSVP Object in the PATH message containing the LABEL_REQUEST Object), OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用上述指定的RSVP协议（即，包含LABEL_请求对象的路径消息中没有DIFFSERV RSVP对象），或

contents.text: * using the CR-LDP protocol as specified above (i.e., no Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages).
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用如上所述的CR-LDP协议（即，LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中没有区分服务TLV）。

contents.text: - protection is activated on all the E-LSPs in order to achieve MPLS protection via mechanisms outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在所有E-LSP上激活保护，以便通过本文档范围之外的机制实现MPLS保护。

contents.text: A.4 Scenario 4: per-OA Traffic Engineering/MPLS Protection
contents.zh-CHS: A.4场景4：每OA流量工程/MPLS保护

contents.text: A Service Provider running any number of BAs over MPLS, performing per-OA Traffic Engineering (i.e., performing a separate path selection for each OA) and performing per-OA MPLS protection (i.e., performing protection with potentially different levels of protection for the different OAs) in his/her network, may elect to run Diff-Serv over MPLS using one L-LSP per <FEC,OA> pair established via RSVP or CR-LDP.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务提供商通过MPLS运行任意数量的BAs，在其网络中执行每个OA流量工程（即，为每个OA执行单独的路径选择）和执行每个OA MPLS保护（即，为不同OA执行具有潜在不同保护级别的保护），可以选择使用通过RSVP或CR-LDP建立的每个<FEC，OA>对的一个L-LSP在MPLS上运行区分服务。

contents.text: Operations can be summarized as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 业务可总结如下：

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC (e.g., bandwidth allocated to AF1) and the dropping behavior for each PHB (e.g., drop profile for AF11, AF12, AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置每个PSC的调度行为（例如，分配给AF1的带宽）和每个PHB的丢弃行为（例如，AF11、AF12、AF13的丢弃配置文件）

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of one L-LSP per <FEC,OA>:
contents.zh-CHS: - 每个<FEC，OA>建立一个L-LSP的LSRs信号：

contents.text: * using the RSVP as specified above to signal the L-LSP's PSC (i.e., DIFFSERV RSVP Object in the PATH message containing the LABEL_REQUEST), OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用上面指定的RSVP向L-LSP的PSC发送信号（即，包含标签请求的路径消息中的DIFFSERV RSVP对象），或

contents.text: * using the CR-LDP protocol as specified above to signal the L-LSP PSC (i.e., Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages).
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用如上所述的CR-LDP协议向L-LSP PSC发送信号（即LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中的Diff-Serv TLV）。

contents.text: - the appropriate level of protection is activated on the different L-LSPs (potentially with a different level of protection for each PSC) via mechanisms outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过本文件范围外的机制，在不同的L-LSP上激活适当的保护级别（每个PSC可能具有不同的保护级别）。

contents.text: A.5 Scenario 5: 8 (or fewer) BAs, per-OA Traffic Engineering/MPLS Protection
contents.zh-CHS: A.5场景5：每个OA流量工程/MPLS保护8个（或更少）BAs

contents.text: A Service Provider running 8 (or fewer) BAs over MPLS, performing per-OA Traffic Engineering (i.e., performing a separate path selection for each OA) and performing per-OA MPLS protection (i.e., performing protection with potentially different levels of protection for the different OAs) in his/her network, may elect to run Diff-Serv over MPLS using one E-LSP per <FEC,OA> pair established via RSVP or CR-LDP. Furthermore, the Service Provider may elect to use the preconfigured mapping on all the E-LSPs.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过MPLS运行8个（或更少）BAs的服务提供商，在其网络中执行每个OA流量工程（即，为每个OA执行单独的路径选择）和执行每个OA MPLS保护（即，为不同OA执行具有潜在不同保护级别的保护），可以选择使用通过RSVP或CR-LDP建立的每个<FEC，OA>对一个E-LSP在MPLS上运行区分服务。此外，服务提供商可以选择在所有E-lsp上使用预配置映射。

contents.text: Operations can be summarized as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 业务可总结如下：

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR the bi-directional mapping between each PHB and a value of the EXP field (e.g., 000<-->AF11, 001<-->AF12, 010<-->AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR配置每个PHB和EXP字段值之间的双向映射（例如，000<-->AF11、001<-->AF12、010<-->AF13）

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC (e.g., bandwidth allocated to AF1) and the dropping behavior for each PHB (eg drop profile for AF11, AF12, AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置每个PSC的调度行为（例如，分配给AF1的带宽）和每个PHB的丢弃行为（例如AF11、AF12、AF13的丢弃配置文件）

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of one E-LSP per <FEC,OA>:
contents.zh-CHS: - 每个<FEC，OA>建立一个E-LSP的LSRs信号：

contents.text: * using the RSVP protocol as specified above to signal that the LSP is an E-LSP which uses the preconfigured mapping (i.e., no DIFFSERV RSVP Object in the PATH message containing the LABEL_REQUEST), OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用如上所述的RSVP协议来表示LSP是使用预配置映射的E-LSP（即，在包含标签请求的路径消息中没有DIFFSERV RSVP对象），或者

contents.text: * using the CR-LDP protocol as specified above to signal that the LSP is an E-LSP which uses the preconfigured mapping (i.e., no Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages)
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用如上所述的CR-LDP协议来表示LSP是使用预配置映射的E-LSP（即，LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中没有Diff-Serv TLV）

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures, for each E-LSP, at the head-end of that E-LSP, a filtering/forwarding criteria so that only the packets belonging to a given OA are forwarded on the E-LSP established for the corresponding FEC and corresponding OA.
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商为每个E-LSP在该E-LSP的前端配置过滤/转发标准，以便在为相应FEC和相应OA建立的E-LSP上仅转发属于给定OA的分组。

contents.text: - the appropriate level of protection is activated on the different E-LSPs (potentially with a different level of protection depending on the PSC actually transported over each E-LSP) via mechanisms outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过本文件范围之外的机制，在不同的E-LSP上激活适当的保护级别（可能具有不同的保护级别，具体取决于每个E-LSP上实际传输的PSC）。

contents.text: A.6 Scenario 6: no Traffic Engineering/MPLS Protection on 8 BAs, per-OA Traffic Engineering/MPLS Protection on other BAs.
contents.zh-CHS: A.6场景6：8个BAs上没有流量工程/MPLS保护，其他BAs上每个OA流量工程/MPLS保护。

contents.text: A Service Provider not performing Traffic Engineering/MPLS Protection on 8 (or fewer) BAs, performing per-OA Traffic Engineering/MPLS Protection on the other BAs (i.e., performing a separate path selection for each OA corresponding to the other BAs and performing MPLS Protection with a potentially different policy for each of these OA) and using the MPLS Shim encapsulation in his/her network may elect to run Diff-Serv over MPLS, using for each FEC:
contents.zh-CHS: 服务提供商不在8个（或更少）BAs上执行流量工程/MPLS保护，在另一个BAs上执行每个OA流量工程/MPLS保护（即，为对应于另一个BAs的每个OA执行单独的路径选择，并为这些OA中的每一个执行具有潜在不同策略的MPLS保护）并且在他/她的网络中使用MPLS垫片封装可以选择在MPLS上运行区分服务，对于每个FEC使用：

contents.text: - one E-LSP using the preconfigured mapping established via LDP to support the set of 8 (or fewer) non-traffic-engineered/non-protected BAs, AND
contents.zh-CHS: - 一个E-LSP，使用通过LDP建立的预配置映射来支持8个（或更少）非流量工程/非保护BAs，以及

contents.text: - one L-LSP per <FEC,OA> pair established via RSVP or CR-LDP for support of the other BAs.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过RSVP或CR-LDP建立的每个<FEC，OA>对一个L-LSP，用于支持其他BAs。

contents.text: Operations can be summarized as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 业务可总结如下：

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR the bi-directional mapping between each PHB and a value of the EXP field for the BAs supported over the E-LSP
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR配置每个PHB和E-LSP支持的BAs的EXP字段值之间的双向映射

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC supported over the E-LSP and the dropping behavior for each corresponding PHB
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置E-LSP支持的每个PSC的调度行为以及每个对应PHB的丢弃行为

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC supported over the L-LSPs and the dropping behavior for each corresponding PHB
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置L-LSP支持的每个PSC的调度行为以及每个对应PHB的丢弃行为

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of a single E-LSP per FEC for the non-traffic engineered BAs using LDP as specified above (i.e., no Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages)
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用如上所述的LDP（即，LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中没有区分服务TLV）为非流量工程BAs的每个FEC建立单个E-LSP的LSRs信号

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of one L-LSP per <FEC,OA> for the other BAs:
contents.zh-CHS: - 为另一个BAs的每个<FEC，OA>建立一个L-LSP的LSRs信号：

contents.text: * using the RSVP protocol as specified above to signal the L-LSP PSC (i.e., DIFFSERV RSVP Object in the PATH message containing the LABEL_REQUEST Object), OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用如上所述的RSVP协议向L-LSP PSC发送信号（即，包含LABEL_请求对象的路径消息中的DIFFSERV RSVP对象），或

contents.text: * using the CR-LDP protocol as specified above to signal the L-LSP PSC (i.e., Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages).
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用如上所述的CR-LDP协议向L-LSP PSC发送信号（即LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中的Diff-Serv TLV）。

contents.text: - protection is not activated on the E-LSPs.
contents.zh-CHS: - E-LSP上的保护未激活。

contents.text: - the appropriate level of protection is activated on the different L-LSPs (potentially with a different level of protection depending on the L-LSP's PSC) via mechanisms outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通过本文件范围外的机制，在不同的L-LSP上激活适当的保护级别（可能具有不同的保护级别，具体取决于L-LSP的PSC）。

contents.text: A.7 Scenario 7: More than 8 BAs, no Traffic Engineering, no MPLS Protection
contents.zh-CHS: A.7场景7：超过8个BAs，无流量工程，无MPLS保护

contents.text: A Service Provider running more than 8 BAs over MPLS, not performing Traffic engineering, not performing MPLS protection and using MPLS Shim Header encapsulation in his/her network, may elect to run Diff-Serv over MPLS using two E-LSPs per FEC established via LDP and using signaled `EXP<-->PHB mapping'.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过MPLS运行8个以上BAs、不执行流量工程、不执行MPLS保护并在其网络中使用MPLS垫片头封装的服务提供商可以选择使用通过LDP建立的每个FEC的两个E-LSP并使用信号“EXP<-->PHB映射”在MPLS上运行区分服务。

contents.text: Operations can be summarized as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 业务可总结如下：

contents.text: - the Service Provider configures at every LSR, and for every interface, the scheduling behavior for each PSC (e.g., bandwidth allocated to AF1) and the dropping behavior for each PHB (e.g., drop profile for AF11, AF12, AF13)
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务提供商在每个LSR和每个接口上配置每个PSC的调度行为（例如，分配给AF1的带宽）和每个PHB的丢弃行为（例如，AF11、AF12、AF13的丢弃配置文件）

contents.text: - LSRs signal establishment of two E-LSPs per FEC using LDP in accordance with the specification above (i.e., Diff-Serv TLV in LDP Label Request/Label Mapping messages to explicitly indicate that the LSP is an E-LSP and its `EXP<-->PHB mapping'). The signaled mapping will indicate the subset of 8 (or less) BAs to be transported on each E-LSP and what EXP values are mapped to each BA on each E-LSP.
contents.zh-CHS: - 根据上述规范，使用LDP为每个FEC建立两个E-LSP的LSRs信号（即，LDP标签请求/标签映射消息中的Diff-Serv TLV，明确指示LSP是E-LSP及其“EXP<-->PHB映射”）。信号映射将指示每个E-LSP上要传输的8个（或更少）BA的子集，以及每个E-LSP上映射到每个BA的EXP值。

contents.text: APPENDIX B. Example Bandwidth Reservation Scenarios
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.带宽预留场景示例

contents.text: B.1 Scenario 1: No Bandwidth Reservation
contents.zh-CHS: B.1场景1：无带宽预留

contents.text: Consider the case where a network administrator elects to:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑网络管理员选择的情况：

contents.text: - have Diff-Serv resources entirely provisioned off-line (e.g., via Command Line Interface, via SNMP, via COPS,...)
contents.zh-CHS: - 完全离线配置差异服务资源（例如，通过命令行界面、通过SNMP、通过COP等）

contents.text: - have Shortest Path Routing used for all the Diff-Serv traffic.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将最短路径路由用于所有区分服务流量。

contents.text: This is the closest model to provisioned Diff-Serv over non-MPLS IP. In that case, E-LSPs and/or L-LSPs would be established without signaled bandwidth.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是最接近于通过非MPLS IP提供区分服务的模型。在这种情况下，将在没有信号带宽的情况下建立E-lsp和/或L-lsp。

contents.text: B.2 Scenario 2: Bandwidth Reservation for per-PSC Admission Control
contents.zh-CHS: B.2场景2：每个PSC准入控制的带宽预留

contents.text: Consider the case where a network administrator elects to:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑网络管理员选择的情况：

contents.text: - have Diff-Serv resources entirely provisioned off-line (e.g., via Command Line Interface, via SNMP, via COPS,...)
contents.zh-CHS: - 完全离线配置差异服务资源（例如，通过命令行界面、通过SNMP、通过COP等）

contents.text: - use L-LSPs
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用L-LSP

contents.text: - have Constraint Based Routing performed separately for each PSC, where one of the constraints is availability of bandwidth from the bandwidth allocated to the relevant PSC.
contents.zh-CHS: - 为每个PSC单独执行基于约束的路由，其中一个约束是分配给相关PSC的带宽的带宽可用性。

contents.text: In that case, L-LSPs would be established with signaled bandwidth. The bandwidth signaled at L-LSP establishment would be used by LSRs to perform admission control at every hop to ensure that the constraint on availability of bandwidth for the relevant PSC is met.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，将使用信号带宽建立L-LSP。在L-LSP建立时发信号的带宽将被LSR用于在每个跃点执行接纳控制，以确保满足相关PSC的带宽可用性约束。

contents.text: B.3 Scenario 3: Bandwidth Reservation for per-PSC Admission Control and per-PSC Resource Adjustment
contents.zh-CHS: B.3场景3：每个PSC准入控制和每个PSC资源调整的带宽预留

contents.text: Consider the case where a network administrator elects to:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑网络管理员选择的情况：

contents.text: - use L-LSPs
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用L-LSP

contents.text: - have Constraint Based Routing performed separately for each PSC, where one of the constraints is availability of bandwidth from the bandwidth allocated to the relevant PSC.
contents.zh-CHS: - 为每个PSC单独执行基于约束的路由，其中一个约束是分配给相关PSC的带宽的带宽可用性。

contents.text: - have Diff-Serv resources dynamically adjusted
contents.zh-CHS: - 动态调整区分服务资源

contents.text: In that case, L-LSPs would be established with signaled bandwidth. The bandwidth signaled at L-LSP establishment would be used by LSRs to attempt to adjust the resources allocated to the relevant PSC (e.g., scheduling weight) and then perform admission control to ensure that the constraint on availability of bandwidth for the relevant PSC is met after the adjustment.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，将使用信号带宽建立L-LSP。在L-LSP建立时发信号的带宽将被lsr用于尝试调整分配给相关PSC的资源（例如，调度权重），然后执行接纳控制，以确保在调整后满足对相关PSC的带宽可用性的约束。
